title: safe-py-runner {{tag}}
description:
Release notes for {{tag}}.

- Improved quality workflow in `Makefile`: `make test` now runs `ruff`, `mypy`, and `pytest` in order.
- Added dedicated `make lint` and `make typecheck` targets for focused local checks.
- Updated `make check-version` to print the actual version from `pyproject.toml`.
- Aligned branch guidance in docs and Makefile help output with repository usage (`master`).
- Expanded README and PyPI docs with explicit "good fit" vs "not good alone" scope guidance.
- Refreshed "Common Gotchas" to match current behavior (engine requirement, allow-mode filtering, importlib blocking, pinned package specs, Docker fallback behavior).
- Fixed CI trigger mismatch by updating verify workflow to run on both `master` and `main`.
- Added regression tests for Makefile workflow/docs consistency and CI workflow trigger config.
